r.d: Package for communicating with NNTP/Usenet servers
r.n: + Fix: connect() now returns false when posting is prohibited, like cmdModeReader() does + New: Response code constants + Misc. internal rewrites in protocol implementation: - Expected response codes in cmdArticle(), cmdHead() and cmdBody() reduced to correspond actual implementations. - First parameter in cmdXOver(), cmdXROver() and cmdListgroup() is now optional - New third optional parameter in getNewNews() and cmdNewnews(). - cmdNext(), cmdLast() and cmdStat() now returns array by default
